resources.string: To send SMS with your location

Ladies' well-being is a major concern which has been the main theme to date. Ladies' security matters a ton whether at home, outside the home, or working spot.This is an easy to use application that can be gotten to by any individual who has introduced it on their cell phones. In this System User needs to feed 3 personal Conatct Number in case of Emergency. After completing the task, User can now start the app and can Use the Service Provided.



 Services are:-
 1. There will be Security Siren which keeps ringing until you press it again to stop. This function will help in a way that atleast someone will notice the Activity going around and can help a Women.
 2. After you have entered the emergency Contacts , When you click on SMS button, the SMS will go to the provided contacts with your location.
 3. There is Phone Icon button that directly calls to the Police.
 4. Phonebook button will directly open your Contact list.


There will Women Helpine Number Available in the App.


App Created By:-
 Students of Indus University
 B.tech CSE 


 Name - 1. Shrey Bhadresh Mehta 2. Sanjana Jayesh Patel
